scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --workspace frontend run dev" "npm --workspace backend run dev" "npm --workspace react-gift-mock-server run start:dev"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mock
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:mock
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:mock
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:mock
